author: nflaig
content:
Would be good to get more feedback on https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/546 before merging it, mostly from L2s which will be the primary consumer of the blobs api.

Open questions are
- response content: KZG commitments / versioned hash together with the blob vs. just the blob
- query parameters/filters: indices vs. versioned hashes

Feedback can be provided async on the PR
